column1: Automatic Generation of Chinese Short Product Titles for Mobile Display

column3: Kenny Q. Zhu@Shanghai Jiao Tong University
column6: Lu Duan@Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co.

column1: This paper studies the problem of automatically extracting a short title from a manually written longer description of Ecommerce products for display on mobile devices. It is a new extractive summarization problem on short text inputs
column2: for which we propose a feature-enriched network model
column3: combining three different categories of features in parallel. Experimental results show that our framework significantly outperforms several baselines by a substantial gain of 4.5%. Moreover
column4: we produce an extractive summarization dataset for Ecommerce short texts and will release it to the research community.
